alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 12 at 3:43AM MDT until April 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Fremont County, Teller County and the Rampant Range above 7500 feet which includes Pikes Peak. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
